comments.raw_text:
We are going to enable smooth scrolling by default on mozilla-central and see how if there are any issues with mouse/touchpad drivers. If any issues are found with mouse/touchpad drivers, please mark those bugs as blocking this bug.

We hope to land smooth scrolling enabled by default (bug 198964) soon, but with the intention of backing it out on Aurora so that it can get some more time to bake on Nightly.
